translations: 白血病的；白血球过多症

sentences.sentence: Verapamil and erythromycin could reverse the MDR of leukemic cells.
sentences.translation: 异搏定和红霉素对白血病细胞MDR有逆转作用。

sentences.sentence: The cell undergoes a leukemic change and it multiplies into many cells.
sentences.translation: 这个细胞发生了癌变，并且迅速增生为许多癌细胞。

sentences.sentence: Leukemic stem cell (LSC) is one of the main reasons of leukemia relapse.
sentences.translation: 白血病干细胞(LSC)是白血病复发的主要原因之一。
